user_input: Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's input for TYNDP 2026 hydrogen demand. Generate hourly profiles with node splitting and export to TST format without accessing any PLEXOS database.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050, with node splitting enabled. Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting, without accessing any PLEXOS database.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles using the specified scenarios and years, ensuring node splitting is applied. Do not query or modify any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Export the generated hydrogen demand profiles to TST format for the TYNDP study team using carrier 'Hydrogen'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', export the outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' into TST workbooks for the Hydrogen carrier. Do not access any PLEXOS database.
